summary.span: 指定一个安装程序，该程序从组件复制属性以供安装时使用。

span.span: Specifies an installer that copies properties from a component to use at install time.

para.span: 当从继承时 ，必须重写 方法，并且通常会重写 和 方法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the method, and typically override the and methods.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，从指定的组件复制安装时需要的所有属性。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, copies all the properties that are required at install time from the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序应该从实时组件获取它可以的所有信息，并将其存储在安装时使用。The installer should take all the information it can from the live component, and store it for use at install time. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类，该类将 `MyInstallClass` 创建事件日志，并将事件日志组件的属性复制到 。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the . 它还检查是否 可以执行与相同的安装类型 。It also checks whether the can perform the same kind of installation as the . summary.span: 确定指定的安装程序是否与此安装程序安装相同的对象。

span.span: Determines if the specified installer installs the same object as this installer.

returns.span: 如果此安装程序和 参数指定的安装程序安装相同的对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter install the same object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， `true` 仅当此安装程序和参数指定的安装程序 `otherInstaller` 安装相同的对象时才返回。Typically, returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter install the same object. 在这种情况下， 对任一安装程序调用或方法都会导致相同的系统状态。In such a case, calling the or method on either installer results in the same system state. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类，该类将 `MyInstallClass` 创建事件日志，并将事件日志组件的属性复制到 对象。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the object. 它还检查 对象是否可以处理与相同的安装类型 。It also checks whether object can handle the same kind of installation as .
